references.reason: This paper introduces a state-of-the-art object detection model used as a baseline for comparison in the current work.

references.paper_title: CLEVR: A diagnostic dataset for compositional language and elementary visual reasoning
references.reason: This paper provides the dataset used for evaluating the proposed object detection method.

references.paper_title: Unsupervised learning of object landmarks through conditional image generation
references.reason: This paper introduces a similar architecture to the one proposed in the current work, providing a basis for comparison and further development.

references.paper_title: Unsupervised object localization: Observing the background to discover objects
references.reason: This paper introduces another relevant unsupervised object detection method used for comparison.

references.paper_title: Cut and learn for unsupervised object detection and instance segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduces yet another state-of-the-art unsupervised object detection method that serves as a comparative baseline.
